mapper.sql: a.warnLeakageId AS "warnLeakageId", a.departmentId AS "departmentId", a.officeId AS "officeId", a.code AS "code", a.level AS "level", a.status AS "status", a.collectNumber AS "collectNumber", a.trashId AS "trashId", a.weight AS "weight", a.collectId AS "collectId", a.collectTime AS "collectTime", a.putInTime AS "putInTime", a.warnTime AS "warnTime", a.createDate AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_warn_leakage a ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_warn_leakage( warnLeakageId, departmentId, officeId, code, level, status, collectNumber, trashId, weight, collectId, collectTime, putInTime, warnTime, createDate, remarks ) VALUES ( #{warnLeakageId}, #{departmentId}, #{officeId}, #{code}, #{level}, #{status}, #{collectNumber}, #{trashId}, #{weight}, #{collectId}, #{collectTime}, #{putInTime}, #{warnTime}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_warn_leakage SET departmentId = #{departmentId}, officeId = #{officeId}, code = #{code}, level = #{level}, status = #{status}, collectNumber = #{collectNumber}, trashId = #{trashId}, weight = #{weight}, collectId = #{collectId}, collectTime = #{collectTime}, putInTime = #{putInTime}, warnTime = #{warnTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE warnLeakageId = #{warnLeakageId}
